price: 55 Les élus du Paradis seront, ce Jour-là, entièrement absorbés par les délices dont ils jouiront
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
